name: ecdc: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control

license.text: Users of ECDC public-use data files must comply with data use restrictions to ensure that the information will be used solely for statistical analysis or reporting purposes.

data-fields.timestamp: in seconds since EPOCH; time / date given in the data set
data-fields.iso-3166-1: The two letter country code - as read from the original source
data-fields.original: especially location information for the original data set
